Title: Authorizes Tier II status in the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Walter C. Bedford
Summary: Authorizes Tier II status in the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Walter C. Bedford.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to granting Tier II status in the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Walter C. Bedford
